snippet: The N.B.A. issued flopping warnings to Minnesota’s J. J. Barea and Cleveland’s Donald Sloan, the first under a new policy.
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. issued flopping warnings to Minnesota’s J. J. Barea and Cleveland’s Donald Sloan, the first under a new policy.

headline.seo: N.B.A. Issues Flopping Warnings to J.J. Barea and Donald Sloan
headline.main: N.B.A. Issues Pair of Flopping Warnings
